====================
Needed Test Material
====================

Needed Subpacket Examples
-------------------------

* Reserved (0x00)

* Reserved (0x01)

* Exportable Certification (0x04)

* Reserved (0x08)

* Reserved (0x0D)

* Reserved (0x0E)

* Reserved (0x0F)

* Reserved (0x11)

* Reserved (0x13)

* Signature Target (0x1F)


Needed Packet Examples
----------------------
* Public-Key Encrypted Session Key Packets (Tag 1)

* Signature Packet (Tag 2):
   - type 0x01 - Signature of a canonical text document

   - type 0x02 - Standalone signature

   - type 0x19 - Primary key binding signature
     Note: might already have this one as an embedded signature subpacket

   - type 0x40 - Timestamp signature

   - type 0x50 - Third-Party Confirmation signature

* Symmetric-Key Encrypted Session Key Packets (Tag 3)

* One-Pass Signature Packets (Tag 4)

* Compressed Data Packet (Tag 8)

* Symmetrically Encrypted Data Packet (Tag 9)

* Marker Packet (Obsolete Literal Packet) (Tag 10)

* Literal Data Packet (Tag 11)

* Sym. Encrypted Integrity Protected Data Packet (Tag 18)

* Modification Detection Code Packet (Tag 19)


Needed ASCII-armored blocks
---------------------------

* MESSAGE

* PUBLIC KEY BLOCK

* SIGNATURE

* SIGNED MESSAGE (this one does not have a tail)

* ARMORED FILE (this is a gnupg extension; simply the contents of a file armored as though it were one or more PGP packets)

* PRIVATE KEY BLOCK
